publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4227 Ms Sandra White: Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’—That the Parliament recognises the report, Below the radar: Secret flights to torture and ‘disappearance’, by Amnesty International; agrees that "the programme of rendition and secret detention is eroding the human security and rule of law it claims to protect", and supports Amnesty International’s call for a full public inquiry. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*, Colin Fox*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*

S2M-4227 Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’ (lodged on 5 April 2006) Frances Curran*, Patrick Harvie*, Carolyn Leckie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Chris Ballance*, Fiona Hyslop*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4227 Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’ (lodged on 5 April 2006) Robin Harper*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-4227 Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’ (lodged on 5 April 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4227 Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’ (lodged on 5 April 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4227 Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’ (lodged on 5 April 2006) Christine Grahame*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S2M-4227 Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’ (lodged on 5 April 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4227 Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’ (lodged on 5 April 2006) Eleanor Scott*, Mr John Swinney*
S2M-4227 Below the Radar: Secret Flights to Torture and ‘Disappearance’ (lodged on 5 April 2006) Dennis Canavan*
